original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū avagaṇḍakārakaṁ bhuñjanti …pe…
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū avagaṇḍakārakam bhuñjanti pe
na avagaṇḍakārakam bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca ekato vā ubhato vā gaṇḍaṁ katvā bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca ekatas vā ubhatas vā gaṇḍam katvā bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
